Answer the following question based on the information in the given passage. Passage: Lili Elbe was the first known recipient of male-to-female sex reassignment surgery, in Germany in 1930. summary: Lili Elbe was the first known recipient of male-to-female sex reassignment surgery, in Germany in 1930.
